Text: thx for this m8 :)
Its not working for me! I hear the songs, but no notes are comming, so im unable to play! Can someone help me how to fix it? And thx for the upload btw!

You can load these individuale .ogg files (guitar/rhythm/song.ogg) into REAPER (software) http://www.cdr-zone.com/software/audio_recording/reaper.html

then start up audiograbber http://www.cdr-zone.com/software/audio_ripping/audio_grabber.html
and choose record from soundcard, and setup output to mp3 (if you like), and what ever bitrate you want.

press record in audiograbber and start playback in reaper. 
then you will have a complete rip.mp3

Seed plz......

Some of the rhythm files are duplicates of the ones in other songs. Misirlou, for example, sounds unintelligible with the bass line that should belong to Bad Reputation.

Although this can be fixed by removing the offending rhythm.ogg files*, it means that the affected songs will be without an appropriate bass line. Minor detail, perhaps, but one that I found detracted from the overall experience.

* Getting rid of duplicates is easy: look in the zip file for multiple rhythm.ogg files with the exact same size, and then check the length against the corresponding song.ogg files to determine which one is the real one.
